mapper.select:
SELECT a.id iceboxId,b.external_id externalId , c.chest_model chestModel,c.chest_name chestName,b.last_put_time lastPutTime,a.deposit_money depositMoney, a.status,a.asset_id assetId,b.repair_begin_time repairBeginTime,a.created_time createTime FROM t_ice_box a left join t_ice_box_extend b on a.id = b.id left join t_ice_model c on a.model_id = c.id where a.responseMan_id = #{userId} and b.external_id is not null
and a.asset_id=#{assetId}
